headline: North West derby kicks off Barclays Women’s Super League return
summary: Manchester United and Liverpool go head-to-head as the Barclays Women’s Super League resumes after the international break. Sunday 8 December Manchester United v Liverpool (Leigh Sports Village, 12pm) – live on Sky Sports Manchester City […]

headline: 2024 Barclays WSL Hall of Fame inductees unveiled
summary: Alex Scott, Gilly Flaherty, Steph Houghton and referee Rebecca Welch are this year’s inductees to the Barclays WSL Hall of Fame. Alex Scott MBE won 21 trophies with Arsenal, was capped 140 times by England […]

headline: Shortlist revealed for 2024 FIFPRO Women’s World 11
summary: The FIFPRO Women’s World 11 finalists are the 26 players who received the most votes from their peers for their performances from 21 August 2023 to 10 August 2024. A record-breaking number of professional footballers […]

headline: Durham and Leicester City win Women’s League Cup shoot-outs
summary: Durham and Leicester City both picked up two points after penalty shoot-out victories in the Women’s League Cup group stage. Group A: Newcastle United 1-6 Liverpool Group B: Durham 1-1 Sheffield United (Durham won shoot-out […]

headline: Chelsea Women beat Man Utd to take WSL winning start to eight games
summary: Chelsea went five points clear at the top of the Barclays Women’s Super League with a 1-0 victory over Manchester United. The Blues’ Maika Hamano and Sjoeke Nusken failed to score from around six yards […]

headline: Summanen super strike sends Spurs Women to victory against Villa
summary: Tottenham Hotspur made it back-to-back wins in FA Women’s League Cup Group E with a 1-0 victory over Aston Villa. Eveliina Summanen dramatically struck on the hour, beating goalkeeper Sabrina D’Angelo via the crossbar from […]

headline: Chelsea host Man Utd while Women’s League Cup group stage continues
summary: While Chelsea host Manchester United in the Barclays Women’s Super League this weekend, there is the second round of group games in the League Cup. Spurs take on Aston Villa on Saturday lunchtime, with both […]

headline: Arsenal and Man City into last eight of Women’s Champions League
summary: Arsenal and Manchester City have made it a trio of English sides in the UEFA Women’s Champions League quarter-finals after following Chelsea through. Group C: Vålerenga 1-1 Bayern Munich, Arsenal 1-0 Juventus Group D: Hammarby […]

headline: Manchester United Women continue winning start to League Cup group
summary: Manchester United made it back-to-back wins in FA Women’s League Cup Group A with a 2-0 victory away to Everton on Wednesday evening. Hayley Ladd’s 15th-minute corner led to the opening goal, Everton goalkeeper Courtney […]

headline: Everton Women win Merseyside derby with controversial penalty
summary: Everton win Merseyside derby to climb off bottom of Barclays Women’s Super League, Aston Villa were victorious in stoppage time. Aston Villa 3-2 Crystal Palace Everton 1-0 Liverpool Leicester City 0-2 Manchester United Everton edged […]
